Back to Edvard Grieg

Edvard Grieg

Ballade, op. 24

1875–1876

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

The ballade comprises a theme and fourteen (unnumbered) variations on the Norwegian folk song Den nordlandske Bondestand.

Recommended editions

  • Samlede Verker (Peters) · I/2 · Andre originalkomposisjoner · ed. Dag Schjelderup-Ebbe
  • Henle · HN 431 · ed. Ernst Herttrich / Einar Steen-Nøkleberg
  • Könemann · K 267 · Sonata and Piano Pieces · ed. Thomas Aßmus
  • Peters · EP 3100b · Piano Works / II / Original Works

Duration: 19'

Difficulty: 4
